post.body: If your parents ask where your college $ is going, say "Gimme a pole and I'll show you."
On it, not twerking. C'mon, now. I thought you were from BK.
Bitch, get on that pole! Or this one! Either/or!
Rush, Rush was a classic. It was like Rebel Without A Cause except I didn't have to like think and stuff.
Please. Mexican babies still know how to clear those things. Annnnnnnnd it's 12 your time. (puts on PCD)
That baby just ran into the electric fence!
You'll get your jungle juice in 20 minutes, sister. KAHMEDY~!
You know how a NASCAR car gets fixed in 20 seconds by 18 people? Same deal on clothing Paula Abdul. Also Courtney Love.
Did you mean 12 your time or my time?
OF COURSE SHE DIDN'T! It's Paula Abdul! That's the whole POINT.
What're the odds Paula even knows where she is right now? 4:1 against? 8:1?
Excellent. Sign here. By sign I mean blow, and by here I mean...
She doesn't know about my mistress in BK yet. SHH.
/hug /hug /hug /hug /hug /dryhump /hug
You luuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuvs me. *bats eyelashes*

DEWWWWWWWWWWWW ITTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT
You probably need to jerk it more. And send me pictures. Hey, it's almost Christmas!

They're synonyms.

Plz give me 30 gig iPod kthx. You have so much and I have so little! :(
